HomeFirstProductGrid.description: Gulf Palms Company provides its services to a wide range of clients, including government entities, as well as commercial, industrial, and residential sectors. Our experienced team delivers tailored solutions, from design to execution, based on the specific needs and preferences of our clients.

recentProducts.title: RECENT PRODUCTS
recentProducts.description: Providing outstanding agricultural products, services, and solutions for our clients, both individuals and institutions.

services.description: Our experienced team provides customized solutions from design to execution based on our clients needs while keeping in mind the agricultural environment to ensure sustainable green spaces.

customers.title: WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY ABOUT US
customers.description: Gulf Palms provides you with a good experience. Check our customer reviews. We provide excellent quality and experience.

productsShowcase.heading: GULF PALMS
productsShowcase.title: PALMS PRODUCTS
productsShowcase.description: Our team is constantly working to maintain leadership in the Kuwaiti market through establishing our vision and mission.

whoWeAre.heading: GULF PALMS
whoWeAre.description: Gulf Palms General Trading & Contracting Company (Tissue Culture Palms Centre) was established in 1991 immediately after the invasion. The nursery was purchased in Ar Rai, and palm offshoots were imported from Saudi Arabia. Faced with challenges in importing offshoots of quality varieties, they decided to source from American tissue culture laboratories. Offshoots of the best and most popular palm varieties in the Gulf region were collected and sent to the States for micropropagation. Later, the agreement was terminated, and all the cultures were shifted to Jacques Marionnet, France, which appointed Gulf Palms as its agent in Kuwait & Saudi Arabia.

servicesCarouselData.subtitle: Gulf Palm Services
servicesCarouselData.title: IRRIGATION SYSTEM INSTALLATION
servicesCarouselData.content: Being a pioneer landscaping company across Kuwait, we use superior quality materials and technologies in our automated irrigation solutions. Our ultimate focus is to maintain the freshness of your garden.

servicesCarouselData.subtitle: Gulf Palm Services
servicesCarouselData.title: INDOOR PLANTS MAINTENANCE
servicesCarouselData.content: We ensure that your space is cared for by people that know how. Each of our Plant Care Teams is supported by a supervisor, to ensure an open line of communication for all clients.

servicesCarouselData.subtitle: Gulf Palm Services
servicesCarouselData.title: CONSULTATION
servicesCarouselData.content: Our landscaping consulting service is excellent for the do-it-yourself homeowner that needs a little step in the right direction. The outcome of your consultation with Gulf Palms Landscaping will be wonderful, rewarding, and affordable.

servicesCarouselData.subtitle: Gulf Palm Services
servicesCarouselData.title: PALM MAINTENANCE
servicesCarouselData.content: Gulf Palms provides the best services in supply, planting, transplanting, growing, and production of date Palms. We have the best experts in disease control, pest management, fertilization, and watering requirements of date palms.

servicesCarouselData.subtitle: Gulf Palm Services
servicesCarouselData.title: GARDEN MAINTENANCE
servicesCarouselData.content: Gulf Palms provides a complete range of landscaping maintenance services to maintain the forever charm of your outdoor living spaces. We sign an annual contract for the overall maintenance of the aesthetics of your exterior spaces.

servicesCarouselData.subtitle: Gulf Palm Services
servicesCarouselData.title: FARM DEVELOPMENT
servicesCarouselData.content: Gulf Palm owns and manages the largest nurseries setup. We stock a wide selection of plants ranging from the exotic to the more familiar tried and tested ornamental species with a selection of native local plants.

servicesCarouselData.subtitle: Gulf Palm Services
servicesCarouselData.title: DESIGNING & LANDSCAPING
servicesCarouselData.content: At Gulf Palms, our professional landscape designers and engineers have avid knowledge of various types of deserts adopted trees, shrubs, groundcovers, flowers, and grasses for adding a touch of elegance.

servicesCarouselData.subtitle: Gulf Palm Services
servicesCarouselData.title: PROJECT EXECUTION
servicesCarouselData.content: All our designs are sustainable, cost-effective, and resource-efficient. They preserve nature, water, energy, the environment, and reduce the cost of maintenance significantly.
